games.title: Data Iceberg
games.description: A memory game about different types of data and how we generate data. The game consists of a deck of cards and personal boards with rectangular spaces to place pairs of cards. Each space represents a different category of data.
games.strategy: Relating digital activity with data creation

games.strategy: Manage data from diverse sources with specific software; Carry out complex operations with data (pivot tables, etc.).

games.title: Data Takeover
games.description: As the CEO of a global technology corporation, your goal is to generate as much profit (RealCoins) as possible for your shareholders. Your business model relies on extracting personal data (DataNuggets) from the users of the online platforms you own in order to earn wealth (RealCoins) from other companies contracting your target advertisement services. Your success will be determined by both assets that can work in your advantage and also liabilities that will reduce your power and, ultimately, your wealth. Remember, you do have the ability to bluff your way through the game, but choose your moments wisely. Other players may grow suspicious of you and can challenge you to see if youâ€™re in a web of lies. In order to win, you will need to accrue wealth to take your competitors out of business.
